mapper.sql: customer_id AS customerId, customer_pw AS customerPw, customer_name AS customerName, customer_cellphone AS customerCellphone, customer_profile AS customerProfile, customer_gender AS customerGender, customer_regdate as customerRegdate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer ( customer_id, customer_pw, customer_name ) VALUES ( #{customerId}, PASSWORD(#{customerPw}), #{customerName} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM customer WHERE customer_id = #{customerId}
